summary.title: About me
summary.description: Serving as Software Engineer for 7+ years, predominantly into backend development but also experienced in UI development and DB management. Ability to project manage and provide regular updates about projects in language the client can understand. Currently working in an IoT Application(HVAC System) with various sensors as data sources.

companyList.name: Trane Technologies
description: Part of the IoT(HVAC System) team responsible for design and working in multiple components
Recently been member of Centre Of Excellence team
Leading a team of 3 members for building a new features
Have implemented numerous crucial design changes algorithmically
Took ownership for mentoring Junior developers, reviewing code from other developers, and suggesting improvements if any

companyList.name: Red Black Tree
description: Worked as an contract employee for Trane Technologies
Member of Tools team which takes care of internal tools development
Worked on some of the new tools development and demonstrating the working of a product to the top level managements

companyList.name: DevelopScript LLC
description: Worked as an full-stack individual contributor for 4+ web-applications and team member for 3+ applications, shared by Auction Products(2), EKart(2), Job Portal(1)
Integrally part of design, development and maintenance of the application and database
Integrated different Payment API like Assembly, Zipmark payment for the transaction

companyList.name: IgniteMindz
description: CatalystK( CRM ) CRM for Business, Procurements, Sales and Distribution, Products, Finances, Profiles, Organizations
Written clear and reusable coding and take ownership for the CRM modules and demonstrating the working of a product to the multiple clients
Written BDD Test cases for all the developed modules
